jobs.description: Taking medication and managing one’s illness is hard and that’s something our team at Pilloxa are trying to do something about! If you are in Stockholm, and this is something that you would love to help us with, please join us so that we can make a true difference in peoples’ lives.You would be working with Clojure and React Native as a full-stack dev in a tight team with a strong sense of purpose. Drop me a line here on Facebook or send an email to recruitment@pilloxa.com and I’ll tell you more
jobs.title: System developer

jobs.description: We want 10 years of experience and also that you can work from abroad
